title: Jack Marelli
subtitle: Personal Branding
description: The identity was designed to combine precision, scalability, and adaptability into a clean and distinctive visual system. The brutalist approach allows for a solid and universal foundation, capable of maintaining clarity while adjusting seamlessly to different formats, contexts, and applications. The simplified naming reflects a direct, functional tone aligned with the overall brand logic. Every element - from typography to color - was carefully selected to ensure consistency, while remaining flexible enough to support different scenarios and communication needs. The result is a versatile identity system that can adapt to a variety of digital and professional contexts, reflecting the balance between structure and flexibility that defines my approach to work.

title: 50 Sfumature di Pinot Noir
subtitle: Shopping e eleganza del gusto.
description: I was asked to shape a visual identity that connects shopping with the world of wine culture. The process included defining a color palette, type hierarchy, and icon set to create a refined yet accessible look, easily adaptable across both digital and print touchpoints.

title: Domu
subtitle: Condo management made simple.
description: Domu is a platform that simplifies residential management processes. I worked on defining its full design system, from brand language to interface layouts and interaction flows, ensuring a consistent user experience across multiple devices and scenarios.
